description: When the temperature plummets, nothing is more important than holding on to your body's heat. That’s why the Hot Rydr Pants is designed with innovative features so you can enjoy the outdoors throughout winter. Made with performance-grade fabrics and a floating flannel layer that traps heat, you stay warmer and outside longer. Kuhl’s unique dying process delivers a vintage, “lived-in” appearance as fading occurs.
name: Kuhl Hot Rydr Pants, 30" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: Exklusiv Eurotwill - 98% Twill Cotton, 2% Lycra - 365 g
two front, once coin, two back, one stealth cell phone
